str2: And, even, also, namely.
This; he, she, it.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Of Hebrew origin; Joannes, the name of four Israelites.
Witness, evidence, testimony, reputation. From martus; evidence given.
When, at which time. From hos and te; at which too, i.e. When.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Jewish. From Iouda; Judaean, i.e. Belonging to Jehudah.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
The Greek form of the Hebrew name: Jerusalem. Of Hebrew origin; Hierosolyma

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From apo and stello; set apart, i.e. to send out literally or figuratively.
A priest, one who offers sacrifice to a god (in Jewish and pagan religions; of Christians only met.). From hieros; a priest.
And, even, also, namely.
From Leui; a Levite, i.e. Descendant of Levi.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Apparently from ereo; to interrogate; by implication, to request.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
